title: 443. A Sneak Peek at Biden’s Top Economist
description: The incoming president argues that the economy and the environment are deeply connected. This is reflected in his choice for National Economic Council director — Brian Deese, a climate-policy wonk and veteran of the no-drama-Obama era. But don’t mistake Deese’s lack of drama for a lack of intensity.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
